item.title: Donating
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

If you get donations you have a bigger chance of rs finding you and probably being sued. Servers who dont take them/make a webclient have a better chance of not being caught. The client you use to connect to your server is illegal, but your still using it so it doesnt matter does it?

Now

1.) stop posting these useless topics about illegal things, clients are illegal but it hasnt stopped you yet so just remember your already doing something illegal now stop asking about that.

2.) donations, webclients, and 508+ protocols are more likely to get you caught by jagex then a 317 server would because of the protocol.

Now stop asking about this illegal stuff, unless you actually plan to stop doing illegal things, which im sure your not because your still playing private servers. K answer given.

Read full topic
